title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of clean-shaven seated man dressed as President Lincoln; silver watch chain attached to shiny black vest; playing card? slipped into vest pocket; blurry trees, clouds and blue sky in distance; blurry tree branches in URQ; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
